transcript: you know the road to success and the road to failure are the same road one just ends earlier because the road to success and the road to failure are the same road while you're on it you don't know if you're on the quote right road because it's always the same road and the only way you get off that road is by quitting which is the only way to make it the road to failure and so basically as long as you continue to walk down the road you are walking towards success the moment you stop is the moment that that road becomes a road of failure
